function.name: CreateIcon
function.comment: Create an icon from a given path.
function.prototype: ERROR iconCreateIcon(CSTRING Path, CSTRING Class, CSTRING Theme, CSTRING Filter, LONG Size, struct rkBitmap ** Bitmap)

input.param: The path to the icon, e.g. 'tools/magnifier'
The name of the class requesting the filter (optional).
The icon theme to use. Usually set to NULL for the default.
The graphics filter to apply to the icon. Usually set to NULL for the default.
The pixel size (width and height) of the resulting bitmap. If zero, the default will be returned.
The resulting bitmap will be returned in this parameter. It is the responsibility of the client to terminate the bitmap.
